Paytm Labs | https://www.paytmlabs.com/ | Software Engineer| Toronto, Canada.

Paytm Labs is looking for a Software Engineer to work on our global payments system which needs high scalability, reliability and availability. These challenges require lots of creative thinking based upon a very deep understanding of how software works.

Our stack is: Java, Ruby, C/C++ or Scala

Our ideal candidate is an ace problem solver and a learner at heart. We offer a flexible work schedule and you get your choice of tools (both hardware and software)

About us: In 2017, we launched the Paytm Canada App, a consumer-facing mobile application allowing consumers to pay their bills using multiple payment options with no fees, earn cash back rewards, and make peer-to-peer payments.

Apply here: https://jobs.lever.co/paytm/1d24b691-d484-4f2f-b68c-9a2f07c1...
